meanings.definition: A type of bird with a fan-shaped tail.
meanings.sent1: The fantails chirped happily in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of fantails flying gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the fantails but failed.
meanings.sent4: Her dress flowed behind her like the fantails of a bird.
meanings.sent5: The colorful fantails added beauty to the forest.

meanings.definition: A type of dessert made by spreading a thin layer of batter on a hot surface and rolling it into a cylinder.
meanings.sent1: The bakery's specialty was their delicious fantails.
meanings.sent2: I enjoyed a sweet fantail after dinner.
meanings.sent3: She learned to make fantails at the cooking class.
meanings.sent4: The warm aroma of freshly baked fantails filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The golden-brown fantails melted in my mouth.
